name: InnerHealing Solutions Private Limited
description: Online Video / Audio / Chat Counselling, Therapy & Treatment for various mental health issues from Leading Psychiatrists, Best Online Psychologists Counselling India. India's trusted comprehensive mental health and well-being platform. Our goal is to help you grow from your struggles, heal from your pain, and move forward to where you want to be in your life. Your details are absolutely confidential with us !
Headline: InnerHealing is a mental health and well-being platform, offering online consultation for mental health related issues
ShortDescription: InnerHealing is a comprehensive mental health and well-being platform.

Highlights.name: STRESS AT WORK
Highlights.description: Employees and managers find it easier to work with each other if they can take and receive feedback constructively.

Highlights.name: DEPRESSION & ANXIETY
Highlights.description: Depression, fear, and anxiety are some of the most common and uncomfortable emotions that we can experience. Through online counselling, therapy and treatment, our specialists  help you recover motivation and perspective.

Highlights.name: CHILD COUNSELLING
Highlights.description: Child counselors are mental health specialists, who offer invaluable insight into your child’s social and emotional development and mental health.

enhanced_description: InnerHealing Solutions Private Limited is India's trusted comprehensive mental health and well-being platform, offering online consultation, therapy, and treatment via video, audio, and chat. The platform connects individuals with leading psychiatrists and online psychologists to address various mental health issues including stress at work, depression, anxiety, and anger management. They also provide specialized child counselling. Their core mission is to help individuals grow from struggles, heal from pain, and move forward in life, with a strong emphasis on absolute confidentiality of user details.
key_use_cases: Online counselling for mental health issues
Therapy and treatment for mental health conditions
competitive_advantages: Comprehensive mental health and well-being platform
Online accessibility via video, audio, and chat
Services from leading psychiatrists and best online psychologists in India
